jd: Hi, Greetings from SourceMantra, Please have a look at the below opportunity and reply to me if you are interested. Job: Senior Python Developer Location : Fremont CA - Onsite – Need Locals Only Duration: Long Term Contract 10+ Years and passport Number is must for Submission. Job Description: Advanced Level experience (8+ years) with Python programming language handling Big Data Experience with Django and/or Flask Experience with PySpark Experience with implementing Data Science algorithms Experience with data munging/wrangling would be good to have Experience using third-party Python libraries including Pandas, Pyarrow, Numpy, etc. Experience with ML libraries like scikit-learn Experience developing REST APIs involving large volume data sets Experience with RDBMS systems. Experience with NoSQL stores (HBase, Cassandra etc.). Rigor in high quality code, automated testing, and other engineering best practices, ability to write reusable code components. This role requires partnering continuously with many stakeholders and global teams daily to stay focused on common goals. This includes coordinating with internal and external teams (onsite/offshore) as necessary.
